Gets or sets the rotation component of the transform as a quaternion. Triggers the OnUpdate event when changed.

public Vector3 Scale { get; set; }

Translation

Gets or sets the translation (position) component of the transform. Triggers the OnUpdate event when changed.

public Vector3 Translation { get; set; }
